endpoints.description: Submit software license information to the system for tracking compliance.
Retrieve compliance status reports for tracked software licenses.
Update details of a specific tracked software license.
Remove a tracked software license from the database.
Fetch detailed usage data for all monitored software.
Configure alerts for license usage thresholds and compliance violations.
List all active alerts and their configurations.
Generate a comprehensive compliance report for oversight purposes.
Retrieve details and historical usage of a specific software license.
Assign a specific software license to a user within the organization.
